meeting_info.organization: City Council Ad Hoc Committee on Administrative Affairs
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Council Chambers and via video conference

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes of the December 12, 2024 and December 16, 2024 meeting of the Ad Hoc Committee on Administrative Affairs.

agenda_items.title: Interview and Deliberate City Manager Candidates
agenda_items.description: Interview and deliberate the qualifications of candidates for the city manager position provided by Baker Tilly and recommend a list of final candidates to be considered by city council. (The committee may interview and deliberate the qualifications of candidates for the city manager position in closed session pursuant to Section 551.074 T.O.M.A.)
